scripts.browser: npm run spec -- --browser firefox & npm run spec -- --browser edge npm run spec -- --browser chrome
scripts.browserAll: npm run all -- --browser firefox & npm run all -- --browser edge npm run all -- --browser chrome --record --key ec1d8e6b-7144-4fef-b4c5-34438da12744
scripts.mochawesome-merge: npx mochawesome-merge cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.regression: npm run delete-results && npm run delete-mochawesome-report && npm run spec && npm run mochawesome-merge
